queryMap.query: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') DATETIME , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) YYYYMMDD , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS' ) TIME , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ) YEAR , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM' ) MONTH , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD' ) DAY , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24' ) HOUR , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI' ) MINUTE , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'SS' ) SECOND , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, NVL(?, 'YYYYMMDD')) CUSTOM FROM DUAL

SELECT /* common_code */ TGC.GRP_CD -- 그룹코드 , TGC.GRP_NM -- 그룹명 , TSC.CD -- 코드 , TSC.CD_NM -- 코드명 , TSC.CD_NM2 -- 코드명 , TSC.RMK -- 비고 , TSC.CD_TERM1 , TSC.CD_TERM2 , TSC.CD_TERM3 , TSC.CD_TERM4 , TSC.CD_TERM5 FROM TBRK_GRP_CD TGC , TBRK_SPEC_CD TSC WHERE TGC.GRP_CD = TSC.GRP_CD AND TSC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TGC.GRP_CD = ?

SELECT TGC.GRP_CD -- 그룹코드 , TGC.GRP_NM -- 그룹명 , TSC.CD -- 코드 , TSC.CD_NM -- 코드명 , TSC.RMK -- 비고 FROM TBRK_GRP_CD TGC , TBRK_SPEC_CD TSC WHERE TGC.GRP_CD = TSC.GRP_CD AND TSC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TGC.GRP_CD = '022'

SELECT DISTINCT(RACE_YY) AS YY
FROM TBDB_DETL_RACE_SCHE
ORDER BY RACE_YY DESC

SELECT rownum row_id , USER_ID -- user id , PSWD -- password , USER_NM -- user name , EMAIL -- email , TEL_NO -- tel no. , FLOC -- 직위 , FGRADE -- 직급 , DEPT_CD -- 부서(실) 코드 , TEAM_CD -- 부서(팀) 코드 , DEPT_NM -- 부서(실) 명 , TEAM_NM -- 부서(팀) 명 FROM (SELECT USER_ID -- user id , PSWD -- password , USER_NM -- user name , EMAIL -- email , TEL_NO -- tel no. , FLOC -- 직위 , FGRADE -- 직급 , DEPT_CD -- 부서(실) 코드 , TEAM_CD -- 부서(팀) 코드 , DEPT_NM -- 부서(실) 명 , TEAM_NM -- 부서(팀) 명 FROM TBRK_USER WHERE USER_NM LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', USER_NM) AND TEAM_NM LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', TEAM_NM) ORDER BY USER_ID )

SELECT /** common_organ */ GROUP_ID AS DEPT_CD , GROUP_NAME AS DEPT_NM , GROUP_PARENT AS HQ_CD , GROUP_INDENT-2 AS LEVL , GROUP_ORDER AS HQ_FULL_NM , ROWNUM AS SEQ , USER_ID , USER_NM , GROUP_NM , '0' CHK , HP_NO FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ORGN.* FROM ( SELECT GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_INDENT, GROUP_PARENT, GROUP_ORDER||'' AS GROUP_ORDER , '' USER_ID, '' USER_NM, GROUP_NAME GROUP_NM, '' AS HP_NO FROM V_GROUP UNION ALL SELECT TEAM_CD, FLOC || ' ' || USER_NM AS GROUP_NAME, GROUP_INDENT+1 AS GROUP_INDENT, GROUP_PARENT AS GROUP_PARENT, GROUP_ORDER || NVL(ORD_NO,999) AS GROUP_ORDER , USER_ID , USER_NM , GROUP_NAME , HP_NO FROM TBRK_USER EMPT, (SELECT GROUP_INDENT,GROUP_PARENT,GROUP_ORDER,GROUP_NAME,GROUP_ID FROM V_GROUP ) DEPT WHERE EMPT.TEAM_CD =DEPT.GROUP_ID ) ORGN START WITH ORGN.GROUP_ID = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGN.GROUP_ID = ORGN.GROUP_PARENT ORDER SIBLINGS BY ORGN.GROUP_PARENT, ORGN.GROUP_ORDER, TO_NUMBER(ORGN.GROUP_INDENT)
) T1 ORDER BY GROUP_ORDER, SEQ

SELECT rownum row_id , USER_ID -- user id , PSWD -- password , USER_NM -- user name , EMAIL -- email , TEL_NO -- tel no. , FLOC -- 직위 , FGRADE -- 직급 , DEPT_CD -- 부서(실) 코드 , TEAM_CD -- 부서(팀) 코드 , DEPT_NM -- 부서(실) 명 , TEAM_NM -- 부서(팀) 명 FROM (SELECT USER_ID -- user id , PSWD -- password , USER_NM -- user name , EMAIL -- email , TEL_NO -- tel no. , FLOC -- 직위 , FGRADE -- 직급 , DEPT_CD -- 부서(실) 코드 , TEAM_CD -- 부서(팀) 코드 , DEPT_NM -- 부서(실) 명 , TEAM_NM -- 부서(팀) 명 FROM TBRK_USER )

SELECT GRP_CD, CD, CD_NM, CD_NM2, CD_TERM1, CD_TERM2, CD_TERM3, CD_TERM4, CD_TERM5, ORD_NO, RMK, DEL_YN, ORD_NO FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND GRP_CD = ? AND (CD LIKE '%' || NVL(?, CD) || '%' OR CD_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(?, CD_NM) || '%') ORDER BY ORD_NO, CD
SELECT GRP_CD, CD, CD_NM, CD_NM2, CD_TERM1, CD_TERM2, CD_TERM3, CD_TERM4, CD_TERM5, ORD_NO, RMK, DEL_YN FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT DISTINCT STND_YEAR FROM TBJB_TMS_SCHE UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')+1) FROM DUAL ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT T1.MN_ID -- 메뉴아이디 , MN_NM -- 메뉴명 , ORD_NO -- 순서번호 , UP_MN_ID -- 상위메뉴ID , PROGRAM_ID AS SCRN_ID -- 화면ID , URL -- 메뉴URL , RMK -- 비고 , LVL -- 메뉴 레벨 FROM ( SELECT TM.* ,LEVEL - 1 AS LVL FROM TBRK_MN TM START WITH TM.MN_ID ='R000000' CONNECT BY PRIOR TM.MN_ID = TM.UP_MN_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY UP_MN_ID, ORD_NO ) T1 WHERE LVL = 1 ORDER BY ORD_NO, MN_LEVEL

SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, '0000', TRIM(TO_CHAR(MAX(SEQ)+1, '0000'))) AS SEQ FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(GUBUNID, 17, 4), '0000') AS SEQ FROM TBRK_APPROVAL WHERE JOB = ? --업무구분 AND STND_YEAR = ? --기준년도 AND TMS = ? --회차 AND DAY_ORD = ? --일차 AND RACE_NO = ? --경주번호 AND REPORT_ID = ? --기안자 )

INSERT INTO TBRK_APPROVAL ( GUBUNID, JOB, STND_YEAR, TMS, DAY_ORD, RACE_NO, SEQ, REPORT_ID, SUBJECT, RTNFLAG, INST_ID, INST_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DT ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'N', ?, SYSDATE, ?, SYSDATE )

SELECT A.*, B.CD_TERM1 MENU_ID FROM (SELECT ? ALARM_CD, C.USER_ID RECV_ID, C.USER_NM RECV_NM, A.SUBJECT, A.CONTENT, C.TEAM_NM DEPT_NM, C.HP_NO, --E.CD_TERM1, DECODE(SUBJECT, NULL, '0', '1') AS CHK FROM TBRK_ALARM A, TBRK_USER C, (SELECT DISTINCT USER_ID FROM TBRK_MN_AUTH) D WHERE A.RECV_ID (+)= C.USER_ID AND C.USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND A.ALARM_CD (+)= ? ) A, TBRK_SPEC_CD B WHERE B.GRP_CD (+)= '106' AND A.ALARM_CD = B.CD(+) ORDER BY A.CHK DESC, A.DEPT_NM, A.RECV_NM

INSERT INTO TBRK_ALARM ( ALARM_CD , RECV_ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , INST_ID , INST_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( ? -- ALARM_CD , ? -- RECV_ID , ? -- SUBJECT , ? -- CONTENT , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DT , ? -- UPDT_ID , SYSDATE -- UPDT_DT )
DELETE FROM TBRK_ALARM WHERE ALARM_CD = ?

SELECT MAX (DECODE (CD, '001', CD_NM)) BZ_INFO0, MAX (DECODE (CD, '002', CD_NM)) BZ_INFO1, MAX (DECODE (CD, '003', CD_NM)) BZ_INFO2, MAX (DECODE (CD, '004', CD_NM)) BZ_INFO3, MAX (DECODE (CD, '005', CD_NM)) BZ_INFO4 FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = '111' GROUP BY GRP_CD

SELECT TZ.ZIP_CD -- 우편번호 , TZ.SIDO -- 시도 , TZ.GUGUN -- 시군구 , TZ.DONG -- 읍면동 , TZ.BUNJI -- 번지 , TZ.SIDO || ' ' || TZ.GUGUN || ' ' || TZ.DONG || ' ' || TZ.BUNJI AS ADDR , TZ.SIDO || ' ' || TZ.GUGUN || ' ' || TZ.DONG AS D_ADDR FROM TBRK_ZIPCD TZ WHERE TZ.DONG LIKE ? || '%' ORDER BY TZ.SEQ

SELECT /* common_search_emp */ '0' AS CHK ,JOB_TIT_NM ,EMP_NO ,EMP_NM FROM TBRF_EV_EMP WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(? , EMP_NO) || '%' AND EMP_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , EMP_NM) || '%' ORDER BY JOB_TIT_CD

SELECT /* common_search_emp_all */ '0' AS CHK ,USER_ID AS EMP_NO ,USER_NM AS EMP_NM ,EMAIL ,TEL_NO ,HP_NO ,FLOC ,FGRADE ,ASSO_CD ,DEPT_CD ,TEAM_CD ,ASSO_NM ,DEPT_NM ,TEAM_NM ,RETIRE_GBN ,JOIN_DATE --입사일자 FROM TBRK_USER WHERE 1=1 AND ( DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , DEPT_NM) || '%' OR TEAM_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , TEAM_NM) || '%' ) AND USER_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , USER_NM) || '%' AND GBN = '005' ORDER BY DISP_ORDER

SELECT /* common_search_emp_temp */ '0' AS CHK ,A.EMP_NO ,A.EMP_NM ,A.DEPT_CD ,A.DEPT_NM ,A.WK_JOB_CD ,B.CD_NM AS WK_JOB_NM FROM TBRK_USER_TEMP A ,TBRK_SPEC_CD B WHERE 1=1 AND A.CO_WRK_GBN = '001' AND A.WK_JOB_CD = B.CD AND B.GRP_CD = '156' AND A.COMM_NO LIKE ? || '%' AND A.WK_JOB_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.EMP_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(? , EMP_NO) || '%' AND A.EMP_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , EMP_NM) || '%' ORDER BY A.WK_JOB_CD

SELECT /* common_search_emp_HolOff */ '0' AS CHK ,EMP_NO AS EMP_NO ,EMP_NM AS EMP_NM ,EMAIL ,TEL_OFFC AS TEL_NO ,CELPON_NO AS HP_NO ,FLOC_NM AS FLOC ,FGRADE_NM AS FGRADE ,'GA'||HQ_CD||'0000' AS ASSO_CD ,'GA'||HQ_CD||DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD ,NULL AS TEAM_CD ,NULL AS ASSO_NM ,DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM ,NULL AS TEAM_NM ,'1' RETIRE_GBN ,NVL(FST_ENTR_DT,HQ_APT_DT) AS FST_ENTR_DT ,RESIGN_DT FROM MYROLE.VW_EMP A WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(HOLOFF_STAT,'1') <> '0' AND RESIGN_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -500, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , DEPT_NM) || '%' ) AND EMP_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(? , EMP_NM) || '%' ORDER BY DEPT_EMP_SEQ

SELECT A.STND_YEAR ,A.TMS TMS_CD ,A.TMS || '회' TMS_NM ,(SELECT MAX(TMS) FROM VW_SDL_INFO WHERE STND_YEAR = ?) CUR_TMS ,MIN(RACE_DAY) RACE_STR_DAY ,MAX(RACE_DAY) RACE_END_DAY ,MAX(MEET_CD) MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO A WHERE 1 =1 AND A.MEET_CD LIKE '%' || NVL(? , A.MEET_CD) || '%' AND A.STND_YEAR LIKE '%' || NVL(? , A.STND_YEAR) || '%' AND A.RACE_DAY LIKE '%' || NVL(? , A.RACE_DAY) || '%' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR DESC,A.TMS DESC

WITH MN_LOGIN AS ( /*common_menu_grp*/ SELECT T1.MN_ID -- 메뉴아이디 , MN_NM -- 메뉴명 , ORD_NO -- 순서번호 , UP_MN_ID -- 상위메뉴ID , PROGRAM_ID AS SCRN_ID -- 화면ID , URL -- 메뉴URL , RMK -- 비고 , LVL -- 메뉴 레벨 , '0' AS CHK , ' ' AS CLOLR , MN_LEVEL -- 메뉴순 , RN , ? AS TOP_MN_ID ,'' as IMGPT ,'' as DIVID ,SRCH_YN FROM ( SELECT TM.* ,LEVEL - 1 AS LVL,ROWNUM AS RN FROM TBRK_MN TM START WITH TM.MN_ID = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR TM.MN_ID = TM.UP_MN_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY UP_MN_ID, ORD_NO, TO_NUMBER(MN_LEVEL) ) T1, (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT MN_ID, 'T' SRCH_YN FROM( SELECT MN_ID FROM TBRK_MN TM WHERE BASE_SRCH_YN ='Y' AND 'NORM' = ( -- NORN: 일반사용자/임시사용자, ESTM:평가사용자 --DECODE((SELECT MAX(GBN) FROM TBRK_USER WHERE USER_ID = ?),'002','TEMP','003','ESTM','NORM') DECODE((SELECT MAX(GBN) FROM TBRK_USER WHERE USER_ID = ?),'003','ESTM','NORM') ) UNION ALL SELECT MN_ID FROM TBRK_MN_AUTH_HIST A ,TBRK_AUTH_APLY_DEPT B ,TBRK_USER C WHERE A.USER_ID = ? AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.AUTH_GBN = '001' AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND B.TEAM_CD = C.TEAM_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN STR_DT_TM AND END_DT_TM AND A.SRCH_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MN_ID ) A ) WHERE MN_ID NOT IN( SELECT MN_ID FROM TBRK_MN WHERE PERSONAL_DATA_MN = 'Y' AND MN_ID NOT IN (SELECT MN_ID FROM TBRK_MN_AUTH_HIST WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PERSONAL_YN = 'Y' AND PERSONAL_AUTH_CHK='Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN STR_DT_TM AND END_DT_TM AND PERSONAL_MN_IP LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) ) ) T2 WHERE T1.LVL > 0 AND T1.MN_ID = T2.MN_ID(+) ORDER BY ORD_NO, RN ) SELECT * FROM MN_LOGIN WHERE MN_ID IN (SELECT UP_MN_ID FROM MN_LOGIN WHERE SRCH_YN = 'T' GROUP BY UP_MN_ID) OR SRCH_YN IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ORD_NO, RN

SELECT A.ALARM_CD ,C.USER_ID
,MAX(C.USER_NM) USER_NM ,MAX(C.HP_NO) HP_NO
,(CASE WHEN SUM(DECODE(A.ALARM_GBN,'001',1,'003',1,0)) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) MSG_SEND_YN ,(CASE WHEN SUM(DECODE(A.ALARM_GBN,'002',1,'003',1,0)) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) SMS_SEND_YN
FROM TBRK_ALARM A, TBRK_USER C WHERE A.RECV_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.ALARM_CD = ? GROUP BY A.ALARM_CD,C.USER_ID

SELECT '1' AS CHK ,A.GBN --구분코드 ,A.USER_ID --사용자ID ,A.PSWD --비밀번호 ,A.USER_NM --사용자명 ,A.EMAIL --이메일 ,A.HP_NO --이동전화번호 ,A.TEL_NO --전화번호 ,A.FLOC --직위 ,A.FGRADE --직급 ,A.BRNC_CD --지점코드 ,A.ASSO_CD --대분류코드 ,A.DEPT_CD --부서코드 ,A.TEAM_CD --팀코드 ,A.TEAM_DETL_CD --팀상세코드 ,A.ASSO_NM --대분류명 ,A.DEPT_NM --부서명 ,A.TEAM_NM --팀명 ,A.INST_ID --작성자 ,A.INST_DT --작성일시 ,A.UPDT_ID --수정자 ,A.UPDT_DT --수정일시 FROM TBRK_USER A --사용자 관리 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TGC.GRP_CD -- 그룹코드 , TGC.GRP_NM -- 그룹명 , TSC.CD -- 코드 , TSC.CD_NM -- 코드명 , TSC.CD_NM2 -- 코드명 , TSC.RMK -- 비고 , TSC.CD_TERM1 , TSC.CD_TERM2 , TSC.CD_TERM3 , TSC.CD_TERM4 , TSC.CD_TERM5 FROM TBRK_GRP_CD TGC , TBRK_SPEC_CD TSC WHERE TGC.GRP_CD = TSC.GRP_CD AND TSC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TGC.GRP_CD IN ('018' ,'032')
SELECT PERSONAL_DATA_MN, ? AS PERSONAL_MN_ID FROM TBRK_MN WHERE MN_ID = ?

SELECT PERSONAL_AUTH_CHK, USER_ID, concat(concat('[',PERSONAL_MN_IP),']') AS PERSONAL_MN_IP FROM ( SELECT SEQ_NO, PERSONAL_AUTH_CHK, USER_ID, PERSONAL_MN_IP FROM TBRK_PERSONAL_MN_AUTH_HIST WHERE PERSONAL_MN_ID = ? AND USER_ID = ? ORDER BY SEQ_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
